pages.text: The $(d)Spectre Sapling$() grows into a translucent Spectre Tree.$(br2)Its Leaves have a chance of dropping $(l:items/ectoplasm)Ectoplasm$(/l), which makes it a very nice reusable source!
pages.title: Spectre Sapling

pages.text: Create a Spectre Sapling by right-clicking any Sapling block with an Ectoplasm.
